Package core.test

Class Test

java.lang.Object
core.test.Test
public class Test extends Object
The main Test object containing the Question objects and the test properties

  • Constructor Details

    • Test

      public Test()
      Empty test constructor

    • Test

      public Test(String title, boolean hasTimeLimit, int hours, int mins, boolean hasMinScore, double minScore, double correctAnsScore, double incorrectAnsScore, double partialAnsScore, boolean canCheckAnswer)
      Filled test constructor
      Parameters:
      title - the name of the test
      hasTimeLimit - whether the test has a time limit or not
      hours - the hour limit for the test
      mins - the minute limit for the test
      hasMinScore - whether the test has a minimum score or not
      minScore - the minimum score to pass the test
      correctAnsScore - the score change for every correct question (can be negative)
      incorrectAnsScore - the score change for every incorrect question (can be positive)
      partialAnsScore - the maximum score change for a partially correct question ((correctAnswers/totalCorrectAnswers)*partialAnsScore)
      canCheckAnswer - whether the user can check if a question is correct before finishing the test
